DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety effectiveness investigational stent CoStar™ Paclitaxel-Eluting Coronary Stent- reservoir base DES system comparison surface coat DES stent ( TAXUS™ Express2™ Paclitaxel-Eluting Coronary Stent ) treatment single-vessel ( one blood vessel ) multi-vessel ( two three blood vessel ) coronary artery disease .
DOC.brief_title: Cobalt Chromium Stent With Antiproliferative Restenosis II Trial ( COSTAR II )
DOC.detailed_description: Non -inferiority 8-month Major Adverse Cardiac Events ( MACE ) in-segment late lumen loss 9 month CoStar™ Paclitaxel-Eluting Coronary Stent System TAXUS™ Express2™ Drug Eluting Coronary Stent System treatment single de novo lesion per vessel patient single multi-vessel coronary disease .
DOC.criteria: General Eligible percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) Documented stable unstable angina pectoris ( Class I , II , III IV ) , document ischemia , document silent ischemia Documented LVEF ≥25 % within last 6 week . Eligible coronary artery bypass graft surgery ( CABG ) General Known sensitivity paclitaxel polymeric matrix : Translute PLGA . Planned treatment PCI device target vessel ( ) . MI within 72 hour prior index procedure Patient cardiogenic shock Cerebrovascular Accident ( CVA ) within past 6 month Acute chronic renal dysfunction ( creatinine > 2.0 mg/dl > 150 µmol/L ) Contraindication ASA clopidogrel Thrombocytopenia Active GI bleeding within past three month Known allergy stainless steel cobalt chromium Any prior true anaphylactic reaction contrast agent Patient currently take colchicine
